abstract: American drone strike in Somalia kills Shabab commander and other members of Islamist extremist group.
lead_paragraph: A senior commander and other members of the Islamist extremist group Shabab were reported to be killed by an American drone strike in Somalia.

headline.main: Somalia: Militants Said to Be Hit by U.S. Drone Strike
headline.print_headline: Africa; Somalia: Militants Said to Be Hit by U.S. Drone Strike

snippet: A senior commander and other members of the Islamist extremist group Shabab were reported to be killed by an American drone strike in Somalia.
